sentence.Network_en: He got work in a slaughterhouse, then switched to a job at leather - processing factory.

sentence.Network_en: The cattle go to the slaughterhouse , the horses to rodeos.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在他那120英亩地上饲养了20年的牛马.

sentence.Network_en: I also did a day working in a slaughterhouse it was horrible.
sentence.Network_cn: 我还一家屠宰场干过一天那太恐怖了.

entry.def: A slaughterhouse is a place where animals are killed for their meat.

means.word_mean: 1. a building where animals are butchered
